title: Gift code of ${product_name} Pro
e_thanks: #if($codes.length > 1)Thanks for purchasing gift codes of TickTick Pro, here are your gift codes.#else Thanks for purchasing gift code of TickTick Pro, here is your gift code.#end
e_gift_code_desc: For further checking the status of each gift code, please sign in ticktick.com and view Purchase History through Settings, Redeem, Purchase History. Make sure to use it(them) in time because gift code(s) is(are) available for one year since purchasing succeeded.
e_gift_code_help: How to use a gift code?
e_help_app: For mobile device, open TickTick and select Settings, Upgrade to Pro, then youâ€™ll see the Redeem at the bottom of screen, paste the gift code above in the input box.
e_help_web: For website, sign in ticktick.com and select Avatar, Settings, Redeem, then paste the gift code above in the input box.
e_help:
Gift code does not support refund.
Contact us at support@${site_domain}.com if you have any question.
e_footer_forum: If you need help or give us any feedback, please visit our Help Center.
